gov.sandia.rbb.impl.h2.statics
Class H2SString

java.lang.Object
  gov.sandia.rbb.impl.h2.statics.H2SString

public class H2SString
extends java.lang.Object

H2SString contains static methods that are stored procedures in the H2 implementation of RBB The create_rbb.sql script creates aliases for these so they can be called through SQL. The public functions here only accept / return datatypes for which H2 has a SQL mapping.

Method Detail

find

public static java.lang.Long find(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                  java.lang.String s)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieve id for a string. Returns null if the string has no ID. Returns 0 for the null string.

Parameters:
conn -
s -
Returns:
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

findEach

public static java.sql.ResultSet findEach(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                          java.lang.Object[] s)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Return a table STRING, ID which maps each string in s that was already in RBB_STRINGS to its corresponding ID. No mapping is returned for the null string. Note the results are not guaranteed to be in any particular order.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

findSet

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> findSet(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                     java.lang.Object[] s)
                                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
Like findEach but returns result as a hash from Strings to their IDs.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

findArray

public static java.lang.Object[] findArray(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                           java.lang.Object[] a)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
Map each element of the array a to its corresponding id. A may be multi-dimensional, and the result will preserve its structure. Like find(), the result will be 0 for null elements of a, and null for Strings with no mapping.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

toID

public static long toID(java.sql.Connection conn,
                        java.lang.String s)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieve id for a string, or create a new id if necessary. Returns 0L for null string.

Parameters:

s -
Returns:

java.sql.SQLException
